articles.title: Alcaraz v Djokovic: The numbers behind a blockbuster quarterfinal - Australian Open
articles.description: The men’s singles draw at Australian Open 2025 threw up a tantalising prospect, which has played out: a quarterfinal meeting between Novak Djokovic and Carlos Alcaraz.
articles.content:
Djokovic (88.5%) and Alcaraz (85.3%) are among only six players in the Open era to hold a win ratio of at least 85% at the Slams, along with Bjorn Borg, Roger Federer, Rafael Nadal and Rod Laver.
Tu… [+912 chars]
